# Setup preferences in R Studio

We set up the RStudio preferences so that we all work in an identical environment.

Select `Preferences..` from the `File` menu.

![Select Preferences...](ps0.png)

The Global Options... are now on the Tools menu for both windows and macos.

![New location for Global Options...](new_pref.png){fig-align="center" width="310"}

## Appearance

What font to use is up to you, but use a fixed-width font.
I like [fira-code](https://www.fontsquirrel.com/fonts/fira-code).
Courier or Monaco are good alternatives.

## R Markdown:Basic

See [rmarkdown-cookbook chapter 16](https://bookdown.org/yihui/rmarkdown-cookbook/working-directory.html) for details.
We select "Document" for where to evaluate chunck, hence our "working directory will be the directory where our R Notebook is placed.
